oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The school meal system: analysis of calls for tender as a tool for improving quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bocchi, Stefano
Spigarolo, Roberto
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
Produce chain management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The quality of school meals is a very complex issue. Call for tenders are a key instrument impacting food and meal quality.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bocchi, Stefano and Spigarolo, Roberto (2010) The school meal system: analysis of calls for tender as a tool for improving quality. Food policy. [Submitted]
